numbered_ace_sentences: 2. If parents have more money, then their child is more likely to get into a better legacy school.
3. I wonder why it should matter whether parents are rich or poor.
4. Some applicants have the same test scores.
5. If applicants have the same test scores, then all applicants should have an equal chance.
6. This issue relates to me and my community.
7. Some people in my community are poor.
8. Some poor people want to get into a college.
9. The parents of these people went to this college.
10. These people have good test scores.
11. However, these people cannot get into this college.
12. The headline is: Elite colleges have admission advantages.
